content: miss the last chain and the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 2 chain spaces treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts* repeat from * to * 4 more times chain 2 miss the the next st and the chain treble_crochet double_crochet in the 2nd and 3rd chain chain 2 miss the 4th chain and the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts then make a fptr fpdc in the next then a treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st make a v-st in the chain space of the v-st below treble_crochet double_crochet in the last 2 sts turn from row 14 onwards you will just need to repeat the pattern from row 4 to 13 until you have your desired length when i neared the end of my wrap i ended it on row 12 repeat instead of making a chain 2 space in the middle of the diamond i just left it out and replace the gap with 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s the chart pattern is of only one repeat it shows you how to start the wrap and end on each row you just need to add in the amount of repeats you d like your wrap to have if you like the idea of making a scarf version please follow the chart pattern exactly using just the one repeat i would advise blocking the wrap to open out the pattern my wrap measured 19 inches by 70 inches 48cm by 177cm i really hope you enjoy making this pattern as much as i did suzy xx
